attributes.additional_details:
To protect the UK.
To protect the NHS.
To prevent the UK becoming a hub from travel to the USA and elsewhere.
Also to stop Coronavirus 'refugees' seeking free treatment in the UK from other countries.
attributes.background: Stop people from country's restricted by the USA's new measures using the UK as a gateway to travel to the USA and elsewhere. Thus stopping all people, unless with proof of a clear and concise reason for travel.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300932

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
